Introduction

Purpose To study global trend of suicide rate and correlation in recent years, finding a strategy for reducing self-harm behaviors.

Research Methods

  • Literature Review: Find candidate features
  • Data Collection: Collect data from different sources
  • Data Cleaning and Processing: Filter unqualified data, make dataset and fill missing values by regression.
  • Correlation: Pearson correlation by countries
  • Decision Tree:
    • Train a decision tree based on these correlation and trend of suicide rates in countries
    • Decision tree visualization to find the key factors and rule
